snippet: A suspect in 10 robberies dating to September was found in a relative’s closet, hiding under a pile of clothes.
abstract: Dana M Connor, wanted by the Federal Bureau of Investigation in connection with 10 bank robberies in Midtown and Lower Manhattan, is arrested by FBI agents and New York City detectives in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: A suspect in 10 robberies dating to September was found in a relative’s closet, hiding under a pile of clothes.

headline.seo: Man Called ‘Dapper Bandit’ Is Arrested, Police Say
headline.main: Well-Dressed Bank Robber Is Arrested, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Well-Dressed Bank Robber Is Arrested, Authorities Say
